description:
- When we choose one thing, we throw something else away... -
Leaving behind nothing more than a note, Mana suddenly disappears.
Ren and the crew try to piece together where she could have gone,
eventually going to speak to the heavily-injured Walpurgis.
When Walpurgis tells them Mana`s secret and her plan to sacrifice herself,
Ren and crew rush to save her.
Source: Youtube

titles.title: Mana o Sukue! Sorezore no Ketsui
Save Mana! The Decisions They Each Make
マナを救え! それぞれの決意
